attributes.action: No asylum in the UK for two years!
attributes.additional_details: All I see is immigrants wanting asylum, as soon as they get into the country I read an article earlier, It said "immigrants heading to UK as theirs better benefits" I feel Britain need to take a Stand, This is our taxes that we put into the system! I feel asylum should not be allowed to be claimed until you have been in the UK for two years At least. I feel most are not refugees I feel most are here because UK hand people's taxes on a plate.This is unacceptable!
attributes.background: People have no right to walk in and just take free welfare, I'm all for helping, but I feel asylum seekers have not got the right to just walk in to the UK and have a meal ticket for nothing! our government should be offering them jobs! The UK should not have double standards!
